author: cnbc.com
title: Harvest Capital Credit Corporation to Report First Quarter 2018 Results on May 10, 2018
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Harvest Capital Credit Corporation (NASDAQ: HCAP) announced today that it will report its financial results for the fiscal quarter ended March 31, 2018 before market open on Thursday, May 10, 2018. The company will hold a conference call to discuss the results at 11:00 a.m. EDT that morning.
The conference call will feature remarks by Joseph A Jolson, the company’s Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, Richard P. Buckanavage, Managing Director – Head of Business Development, and William E. Alvarez, Jr., the company’s Chief Financial Officer. To participate, dial (888) 566-6060 (domestic) or (973) 200-3100 (international). The conference identification number is 7085889 .
About Harvest Capital Credit Corporation
Harvest Capital Credit Corporation (NASDAQ: HCAP) provides customized financing solutions to privately held small and mid-sized companies in the U.S., generally targeting companies with annual revenues of less than $100 million and annual EBITDA of less than $15 million. The company’s investment objective is to generate both current income and capital appreciation primarily by making direct investments in the form of subordinated debt, senior debt and, to a lesser extent, minority equity investments. Harvest Capital Credit Corporation is externally managed and has elected to be treated as a business development company under the Investment Company Act of 1940.
